text:
the <ant/> task should allow nested fileset's.

<ant inheritAll="true" target="update">
    <fileset dir="${depends.dir}" casesensitive="no">
        <include name="**/*-build.xml"/>
        <exclude name="**/*.temp"/>
    </fileset>
</ant>
creator: brill@jmonkey.com

text:
Ant 1.6 will have a task called 'subant' that can invoke a target in multiple
sub directories.

Pull the source from CVS, or get a nightly build to check it out.

Jesse
